headline: 3 Top Dividend Stocks Yielding Over 3% to Buy With $500 Right Now
summary: Dividend stocks can be fantastic investments.  The best ones pay an attractive and growing stream of dividend income while also delivering healthy stock price appreciation over the long term.  While there are lots of dividend stocks out there, Johnson & Johnson (NYSE: JNJ), Invitation Homes (NYSE: INVH), and NextEra Energy (NYSE: NEE) are three of the best.
